overview: The comedy film tells the story of a widower, Nana who is busy raising her 3 daughters in Penang. A man named Akhbar Khan falls in love with Nana’s eldest daughter, Khairunisa, then is willing to be her bodyguard but he later finds out that Nana has other plans for Khairunisa’s wedding. To convince Nana so that they can marry the couple of their choice, Nana’s daughters, try to persuade Nana to marry Nana’s old lover. But, how surprised they were when Nana announced her engagement to someone.
title: Nana Tanjung
